main event: A UFO sighting was reported on March 30, 1958, in Fayetteville, North Carolina.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for approximately 1 minute and 30 seconds,There was a second witness who also observed the object,The object was reported to have a whitish and bright appearance with clear outlines,The observer estimated the object to be around 5 miles away and moving at about 125 MPH,Local officials attributed the sighting to aircraft or helicopter lights due to proximity to several airfields.
witness description: One witness reported being 33 years old and male; specific details of the second witness were redacted.
